mapper.insert: insert into advertiser (user_email, password, name, company_name, mobile_number, address, address_detail) values (#{userEmail}, #{password}, #{name}, #{companyName}, #{mobileNumber}, #{address}, #{addressDetail})
mapper.select: select user_email from advertiser where name = #{name} and mobile_number = #{mobileNumber}
select insert(password, 4, 5, '*****') from advertiser where user_email = #{userEmail}
